duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide daily direction to the associates within the department in areas such as merchandise presentation, inventory control, pricing, sales enhancements, stocking, and customer service activities.
Support the achievement of Departmental Sales, Gross Margin, Inventory Shrinkage, and Payroll Goals under the direction of the Group Sales or Department Manager.
Assist in staffing the department with 'service' oriented associates, participate in interviewing, make recommendations for selection, coordinate training, and consult with GSM and HR Manager.
Resolve customer and associate opportunities with GSM / DM and HR Manager, maintaining a high level of personal customer service and achieving better than Company average customer service results.
Remain a product 'expert' through ongoing product knowledge training, and conduct product demos to the entire staff.

Assist in carrying out supervisory responsibilities, including interviewing, training, planning, assigning and directing work, measuring and evaluating performance, addressing complaints, and maintaining a positive working environment for all associates.

Assist customers in making buying decisions by identifying and evaluating customers' needs, making product recommendations, and promoting programs including CLUB Membership, VOC, and In-Store Pick-up.
Perform all other duties as assigned.
